attributes.action: stop giving council homes to single mothers under the age of 21 with children with different fathers
attributes.additional_details: stop giving council properties to the single mothers who simply have children so they can get a council property.there are many more genuine,hard-working single mums and dads who through no fault of their own need those homes in times of need.we need to help those who deserve to be helped,not those who expect to be given everything for contributing nothing, simply by playing the system.
